img.alt: Building Outstanding Leaders for Tomorrow's Society

div.h2: Building Outstanding Leaders for Tomorrow's Society
div.p: As a school community, we are committed to providing a quality educational experience to every child who walks through our doors.

Thank you for visiting the Bruning-Davenport Unified School District website. Whether you are considering relocating your family or you currently live in our school community, we understand how important a quality school system is to you and your family. BD USD consists of highly motivated educators who work alongside supportive parents and community members to provide our amazing students with a safe and supportive educational environment that allows for continued success. It is through the high expectations we have for our students and staff that we promote continued excellence and equity in education. As a school community, we are committed to providing a quality educational experience to every child who walks through our doors.
As you visit our website and learn more about Bruning-Davenport Unified School District and the educational opportunities we offer, I hope you will also gain an understanding of the tremendous value we have for the children of our community.
Sincerely,
Mr. Kolin Haecker Superintendent

Parents / Students: This week saw our district enter an unprecedented time in its history. To keep students and staff healthy, All ESU 5 schools have elected to remain closed until May 1, 2020. In the meantime, teachers are working diligently to instruct your students via remote learning to try to ensure that least amount […]

SMOKING – DRINKING – DRUGS The board prohibits the distribution, dispensing, manufacture, possession, use, or being under the influence of beer, wine, alcohol, tobacco, other controlled substances, or “look alike” substances that appear to be tobacco (or nicotine products, vapor products, and e-cigarettes), beer, wine, alcohol or controlled substances by students while on school district […]

TOBACCO-FREE ENVIRONMENT School district facilities, including school vehicles, shall be off-limits for smoking or other uses of tobacco products. For purposes of this policy, it includes all products such as cigars, cigarettes, chewing tobacco, nicotine products, vapor products (including e-cigarettes), and any products intended by appearance or effect to replicate tobacco products. This requirement extends […]
